appName.message: TaskMatrix Pro: Free Task Manager & Tools

appDescription.message: Free Chrome browser extension for intelligent tasks. Visualize your tasks with powerful tools and screen-friendly interface

enableUrgentReminderDesc.message: When a task is about to expire, remind you through icon changes

reminderThresholdDesc.message: When the task remaining time is less than this duration, trigger reminder

reminderIntervalDesc.message: Frequency of checking task status in the background

showIconBadgeDesc.message: Display the number of urgent tasks on the plugin icon

showIconTooltipDesc.message: Display task reminder information when hovering over the icon

taskManagerInstruction.message: Click the list icon for all tasks

analysisReportDesc.message: Click the chart icon for insights

q1Desc.message: Do it now. Critical tasks requiring immediate attention.

q2Desc.message: Schedule it. Strategic tasks for long-term planning.

q3Desc.message: Delegate it. Interruptions that can be handled by others.

q4Desc.message: Eliminate it. Time-wasters that should be avoided.

openTaskMatrix.description: Command description for opening TaskMatrix Pro

failedToGetFormData.description: Error message when form data cannot be retrieved

pleaseEnterTaskTitle.description: Warning message when task title is empty

taskUpdatedSuccessfully.description: Success message when task is updated

taskAddedSuccessfully.description: Success message when task is added

saveFailed.description: Error message when save operation fails

taskNotFound.description: Error message when task is not found

failedToEditTask.description: Error message when task editing fails

taskCompletedSuccessfully.description: Success message when task is completed

failedToCompleteTask.description: Error message when task completion fails

areYouSureDeleteTask.message: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.

taskDeletedSuccessfully.description: Success message when task is deleted

failedToDeleteTask.description: Error message when task deletion fails

settingsSavedSuccessfully.description: Success message when settings are saved

failedToSaveSettings.description: Error message when settings save fails

loadingDataFailed.description: Error message when data loading fails

noTaskFound.description: Empty state message when no tasks are found

clickPlusIconToAddFirstTask.message: Click the plus icon to add your first task
clickPlusIconToAddFirstTask.description: Empty state instruction for adding first task

allCaughtUp.description: Empty state message when no overdue tasks

noOverdueTasksGreatJob.message: No overdue tasks. Great job keeping everything on track!
noOverdueTasksGreatJob.description: Empty state message for no overdue tasks

noCompletedTasks.description: Empty state message when no completed tasks

doubleClickTaskAndClickStatus.message: Double-click on a task and click the status label to mark it as completed
doubleClickTaskAndClickStatus.description: Instruction for marking tasks as completed

noRejectedTasks.description: Empty state message when no rejected tasks

doubleClickTaskAndClickStatusTwice.message: Double-click on a task and click the status label twice to mark it as rejected
doubleClickTaskAndClickStatusTwice.description: Instruction for marking tasks as rejected

notEnoughDataForHeatmap.message: Not enough data to generate heatmap
notEnoughDataForHeatmap.description: Message when there's not enough data for heatmap

notEnoughTaskDataForScatterPlot.message: Not enough task data to generate scatter plot
notEnoughTaskDataForScatterPlot.description: Message when there's not enough data for scatter plot

frequencyOfCheckingTaskStatus.message: Frequency of checking task status in the background
frequencyOfCheckingTaskStatus.description: Description for task status checking frequency

displayNumberOfUrgentTasks.message: Display the number of urgent tasks on the plugin icon

displayTaskReminderInformation.message: Display task reminder information when hovering over the icon

clickListIconForAllTasks.message: Click the list icon for all tasks

clickChartIconForInsights.message: Click the chart icon for insights

doItNowCriticalTasks.message: Do it now. Critical tasks requiring immediate attention.

scheduleItStrategicTasks.message: Schedule it. Strategic tasks for long-term planning.

delegateItInterruptions.message: Delegate it. Interruptions that can be handled by others.

eliminateItTimeWasters.message: Eliminate it. Time-wasters that should be avoided.

whenTaskRemainingTimeLessThanDuration.message: When the task remaining time is less than this duration, trigger reminder
whenTaskRemainingTimeLessThanDuration.description: Description for urgent reminder threshold setting

whenTaskAboutToExpireRemindThroughIcon.message: When a task is about to expire, remind you through icon changes

enableUrgentTaskReminder.description: Enable urgent task reminder checkbox label

invalidDueDate.description: Error message for invalid due date

dueAt.description: Due at prefix for tasks due on specific date

dueIn.description: Due in prefix for tasks due in specific time

taskSourceCompletionRate.description: Task source completion rate chart title

timeCompletionStatusScatter.description: Time completion status scatter chart title

currentlyNotEnoughDataForInsights.message: Currently there is not enough data to generate insights.

q2CompletionRateLowerThanOthers.message: Q2 (Important & Not Urgent) quadrant task completion rate is significantly lower than other quadrants, reflecting "urgent over important" execution bias, which may lead to strategic goal delays in the long term.
q2CompletionRateLowerThanOthers.description: Insight about Q2 completion rate being lower

q3CompletionRateTooHigh.message: Q3 (Not Important & Not Urgent) quadrant task completion rate is too high, beware of "ineffective busyness" - whether too much energy is consumed on trivial tasks, squeezing core task time.
q3CompletionRateTooHigh.description: Insight about Q3 completion rate being too high

q1TasksAccountForHighPercentage.message: Q1 (Important & Urgent) quadrant tasks account for $percentage% of total tasks, suggesting improvement in task planning, handle important tasks early to avoid urgent situations.
q1TasksAccountForHighPercentage.description: Insight about Q1 tasks percentage being high

q4TasksAccountForHighPercentage.message: Q4 (Not Important & Urgent) quadrant tasks account for $percentage% of total tasks, review the sources of these low-priority but urgent tasks, optimize emergency response processes.
q4TasksAccountForHighPercentage.description: Insight about Q4 tasks percentage being high

sourceTasksQ1HighQ2Low.message: "$source" tasks in Q1 (Important & Urgent) achieve $q1Rate% completion rate, but only $q2Rate% in Q2 (Important & Not Urgent), indicating task execution priority is driven by "external pressure" rather than internal strategic focus.
sourceTasksQ1HighQ2Low.description: Insight about source tasks Q1 vs Q2 completion rates

sourceTasksQ4LowCompletionRate.message: "$source" tasks in Q4 (Not Important & Urgent) have low completion rate ($q4Rate%), need to confirm if "temporary tasks" have priority definition issues.
sourceTasksQ4LowCompletionRate.description: Insight about Q4 tasks low completion rate

sourceTasksHighlyConcentratedInQuadrant.message: "$source" are highly concentrated in $quadrant ($quadrantName) quadrant, accounting for $percentage%. Review task planning for reasonableness.
sourceTasksHighlyConcentratedInQuadrant.description: Insight about tasks being concentrated in one quadrant

sourceTasksCompletionRateDifference.message: "$highSource" in $highQuadrant has highest completion rate ($highRate%), while "$lowSource" in $lowQuadrant has lowest ($lowRate%), showing clear differences in processing priority for different task types.
sourceTasksCompletionRateDifference.description: Insight about completion rate differences between sources

q1PendingTasksHighTimeSpent.message: Q1 (Important & Urgent) has $percentage% of pending tasks taking over 3 days, indicating potential resource shortage or unexpected difficulty in core tasks. Consider task breakdown or additional support.
q1PendingTasksHighTimeSpent.description: Insight about Q1 pending tasks taking too long

q4CompletedTasksExceedQ2Time.message: Q4 (Not Important & Urgent) completed tasks average $q4Time days, far exceeding Q2 (Important & Not Urgent) at $q2Time days, indicating "temporary urgent tasks" over-occupying resources. Optimize emergency response processes.
q4CompletedTasksExceedQ2Time.description: Insight about Q4 vs Q2 task completion times

pendingTasksAverageTimeHigher.message: Average processing time for pending tasks ($pendingTime days) is significantly higher than completed tasks ($completedTime days). Focus on long-stuck tasks and adjust strategy or resource allocation when necessary.
pendingTasksAverageTimeHigher.description: Insight about pending vs completed task times

quadrantTaskVolumeFluctuation.message: $quadrantLabel task volume $direction by $rate% from $from to $to, showing significant fluctuation. Consider focusing on task allocation balance.

quadrantCompletionRateUpwardTrend.message: $quadrantLabel task completion rate shows a sustained upward trend, indicating improved work efficiency.
quadrantCompletionRateUpwardTrend.description: Insight about completion rate upward trend

quadrantCompletionRateDownwardTrend.message: $quadrantLabel task completion rate shows a sustained downward trend, requiring attention to execution efficiency issues.
quadrantCompletionRateDownwardTrend.description: Insight about completion rate downward trend

q2TasksContinueToAccumulate.message: Q2 (Important & Not Urgent) tasks continue to accumulate without improvement in completion rate, reflecting that "strategic tasks" are not integrated into regular execution plans, posing a "procrastination accumulation" risk.
